storyDetail.content:
{"title":"Listen up: Spotify Premium is here","description":"Now you can pay for Spotify Premium with our app!

Choose from vouchers for a 1, 2 or 3-month subscription. And if you wanna keep the music playing after that, just come back a get another voucher, it's super easy!","image":"https://storage.googleapis.com/android-analytics-poc.appspot.com/marketing-stories/assets/story_buySpotify_banner.png"}

{"title":"Our Uber and Uber Eats vouchers have arrived","description":"Whether you're staying in or heading out, we've got you covered with vouchers for Uber and Uber Eats available to buy right here in your app.","image":"https://storage.googleapis.com/android-analytics-poc.appspot.com/marketing-stories/assets/story_buyUber_banner.png"}

{"title":"Paying your bills is easier than ever","description":"Need to pay an account like your rates, DSTV, store card or credit card?

We've got you covered.","image":"https://storage.googleapis.com/android-analytics-poc.appspot.com/marketing-stories/assets/story_payYourBill_banner.png"}

{"title":"SendMoney for less with our bank!","description":"You can SendMoney to other bank customers for mahala, and to anyone else with an SA cell number for only R4.","image":"https://storage.googleapis.com/android-analytics-poc.appspot.com/marketing-stories/assets/story_sendForLess_banner.png"}
